Простой toggle

<div class="toggle">
  <label class="control">
    <input type="checkbox" name="checkbox">
  </label>
</div>

Активный toggle

<div class="toggle">
  <label class="control">
    <input type="checkbox" name="checkbox" checked>
  </label>
</div>

Toggle с текстом

<div class="toggle">
  <label class="control">
    <input type="checkbox" name="checkbox" checked>
    Label
  </label>
</div>
